short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display loading time and other metrics realtime.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pagepulse: Web Metrics is a Chrome extension designed for developers to gain real-time insights into webpage performance metrics. This tool overlays critical metrics, such as loading times, resource performance, and usability scores, directly onto any webpage, enabling seamless analysis and optimization without disrupting your workflow.
